page.title: 10Waltham Methodist Church.
page.content: The members of Waltham Methodist Church have met in Cheapside for 110 years.It was orginally a branch of the Church of England but now exists as a Christian Church in its own right.It is one of a circuit grouped around Great Britain and is part of a world-wide organisation. They meet twice every Sunday.At 10.30a.m.there is a Junior Church and at 7.45p.m. a new Young People's Fellowship. There are many varied activities almost daily such as,a Playgroup,a Bible Fellowship Group,the Ladies Guild,Waltham Women's Group, Mums' and Toddlers' Group and Girls' Brigade. There are 65 members of the Church and 300,probably 500,people now linked with it.There are local preachers to lead many services and other people, who seek to worship God, are welcome.
